panels.description:
All instances among pgsql cluster ${cls}

Instance: Goto PGSQL Instance

IP: Goto PGSQL Node

Status: Goto PGSQL Service

Load: max(cpu,postgres,pgbouncer)

Space: Disk space usage max(all device)

Proxy: session number, Goto Haproxy Admin Page

targets.expr:
pg_table_n_tup_mod{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}
/( 1 + pg_table_tup_read{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"})

panels.description: Total scan (index + seq) rate of last 1 minute on this table
panels.title: Table Scan Rate

panels.description: Total scan (index + seq) rate of last 1 minute on this table
panels.title: Row Scan Rate

panels.description: Index scan rate of last 1 minute on this table
panels.title: Index Scan Rate

panels.description: Sequential scan rate of last 1 minute on this table
panels.title: Sequential Scan Rate

panels.description: Tuple Modification (insert|delete|update) in last 5 minutes
panels.title: Rows Modified (5m)

panels.description: Tuple insert rate of last 1 minute & 5 minute
panels.title: Inserts

panels.description: Tuple insert rate of last 1 minute & 5 minute
panels.title: Updates

panels.description: Tuple insert rate of last 1 minute & 5 minute
panels.title: Deletes

panels.description: Rate1m of rows HOT updated
panels.title: HOT Updates

panels.description: Rate1m of rows HOT updated
panels.title: HOT Rate

panels.description: Index scan rate of last 1 minute on this table
panels.title: Index Scan Rate

panels.description: Rate1m of rows HOT updated

targets.expr: rate(pg_index_idx_blks_hit{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]) / (rate(pg_index_idx_blks_read{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]) + rate(pg_index_idx_blks_hit{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]))

panels.title: Index Block Hit Rate

panels.description: Rate of index tuples been read
panels.title: Index Tuple Returned

panels.description: Rate of live table rows fetched by simple index scans using this index
panels.title: Index Tuple Fetched

panels.description: Total scan (index + seq) rate of last 1 minute on this table
panels.title: Sequence Values

panels.description: Index scan tuples/s of last 1 minute
panels.title: Sequence Allocation (1m)

targets.expr: rate(pg_func_total_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", funcname=~".*$relname.*"}[1m]) / rate(pg_func_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", funcname=~".*$relname.*"}[1m])
rate(pg_func_self_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", funcname=~".*$relname.*"}[1m]) / rate(pg_func_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", funcname=~".*$relname.*"}[1m])
rate(pg_func_total_time{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", funcname=~".*$relname.*"}[1m]) / rate(pg_func_calls{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", funcname=~".*$relname.*"}[1m])

panels.description: Rate1m of rows HOT updated

targets.expr: rate(pg_table_heap_blks_hit{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]) / (rate(pg_table_heap_blks_read{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]) + rate(pg_table_heap_blks_hit{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]))

panels.title: Table Heap Block Hit Rate

panels.description: Rate1m of rows HOT updated

targets.expr: rate(pg_table_idx_blks_hit{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]) / (rate(pg_table_idx_blks_read{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]) + rate(pg_table_idx_blks_hit{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]))

panels.title: Table Index Block Hit Rate

panels.description: Rate1m of rows HOT updated

targets.expr: rate(pg_table_toast_blks_hit{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]) / (rate(pg_table_toast_blks_read{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]) + rate(pg_table_toast_blks_hit{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]))

panels.title: Table Toast Block Hit Rate

panels.description: Rate1m of rows HOT updated

targets.expr: rate(pg_table_tidx_blks_hit{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]) / (rate(pg_table_tidx_blks_read{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]) + rate(pg_table_tidx_blks_hit{ins="$ins", datname="$datname", relname="$relname"}[1m]))

panels.title: Table Toast Index Block Hit Rate

panels.description: Vacuum and analyze activity on this table (manual or auto)
panels.title: Maintenance Activity

list.description: Node name of current postgres instance
list.label: Node
list.name: node

list.description: IP address of this postgres instance
list.label: IP
list.name: ip

list.description: Sequence number of this instance, which is an unique integer among a postgres cluster
list.label: Sequence
list.name: seq

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls
